title: Best of The Herd for May 20, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 20, 2020
description:
Dak is going too far and the Cowboys should let him hit the open market

MJ trampled people and it created enemies including former teammates

LeBron is not built for the NFL despite a reported contract offer in 2011

Guests: Nick Wright, FS1's 'First Things First'

Daryl Morey, Houston Rockets GM
